sortCrewByName.name: Sort crew selection by name
sortCrewByName.description: Sort modded characters in crew selection by name, as opposed to the internal order.

sortVanillaCrewByName.name: Also sort vanilla crew
sortVanillaCrewByName.description: Additionally sort vanilla characters together with modded characters.

sortShipsByName.name: Sort ship selection by name
sortShipsByName.description: Sort modded ships in ship selection by name, as opposed to the internal order.

sortVanillaShipsByName.name: Also sort vanilla ships
sortVanillaShipsByName.description: Additionally sort vanilla ships together with modded ships.

detailedCrewInfoSetting.name: Detailed crew info
detailedCrewInfoSetting.description: Replace selected crew count with a list of selected characters.

exeBlacklist.on: Can be randomly selected for a CAT starter EXE card. Click to disable.
exeBlacklist.off: CANNOT be randomly selected for a CAT starter EXE card. Click to enable.

keySetting.name: Mod descriptions
keySetting.description: The keyboard key to hold to show which mod a piece of content comes from.

vanillaSetting.name: Vanilla mod description
vanillaSetting.description: Whether to show the "mod description" for vanilla content too.

deck.exeCard: A random CAT EXE card, like this one:
